settings.content: These colors are used throughout multiple sections and provide consistent styling across your store. For the most consistent experience, use these settings for your primary colors.

settings.label: Interface Element Color
settings.info: Color for header icons, cart drawer text, footer content, and menu drawer text

settings.label: Use Gradient Background
settings.info: When enabled, sections with theme colors will use gradient background

settings.label: Gradient Color 1
settings.info: First color in the gradient background

settings.label: Gradient Color 2
settings.info: Second color in the gradient background

settings.label: Use Dedicated Button Colors
settings.info: When enabled, buttons will use dedicated button colors. When disabled, buttons will use Accent 1 color for background and Section Background color for text.

settings.label: Button Background Color
settings.info: Primary background color for buttons in sections using theme colors

settings.label: Button Text Color
settings.info: Text color for buttons in sections using theme colors

settings.label: App Elements Letter Spacing
settings.info: Controls letter spacing for third-party app elements

settings.label: Apply corner radius to all button elements
settings.info: If unchecked, radius will only apply to primary buttons

settings.content: Preview your button styles in the theme customizer after saving changes.

settings.label: t:settings_schema.animations.settings.animations_hover_elements.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.animations.settings.animations_hover_elements.info

settings.label: Cart Customization Mode
settings.info: When enabled, keeps the cart drawer rendered (visible) for easier customization and theme development. Disable in production.

settings.label: Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer
settings.info: When enabled, the cart drawer will use global theme colors. Disable to use specific cart drawer color settings below.

settings.label: Primary Background Color
settings.info: Main background color for the cart drawer

settings.label: Background Gradient
settings.info: Background gradient for the cart drawer. Use transparent if not needed.

settings.label: Primary Text Color
settings.info: Main text color for cart drawer

settings.label: Header Background Color
settings.info: Background color for the cart drawer header

settings.label: Product Background Color
settings.info: Background color for product items in cart

settings.label: Footer Background Color
settings.info: Background color for the cart drawer footer with totals and checkout button

settings.label: Secondary Text Color
settings.info: Used for subtitles, prices, and secondary information

settings.label: Accent Color
settings.info: Used for highlights and special elements

settings.label: Divider Color
settings.info: Color for dividers and borders in the cart

settings.label: Checkout Button Background
settings.info: Background color for the checkout button

settings.label: Checkout Button Text Color
settings.info: Text color for the checkout button

settings.label: Free Shipping Icon Default Color
settings.info: When 'Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer' is enabled, this will use Accent Color 2

settings.label: Free Shipping Icon Active Color
settings.info: When 'Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer' is enabled, this will use Accent Color 1

settings.label: Progress Bar Active Color
settings.info: When 'Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer' is enabled, this will use Accent Color 1

settings.label: Progress Bar Inactive Color
settings.info: When 'Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer' is enabled, this will use Accent Color 2

settings.label: Progress Bar Active Icon Fill
settings.info: When 'Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer' is enabled, this will use the background color

settings.label: Border Radius
settings.info: Controls the roundness of elements in the cart drawer

settings.label: Cart Item Image Border Radius
settings.info: Controls the roundness of product images in the cart

settings.label: Show Shipping Protection
settings.info: When disabled, the entire shipping protection container will be hidden in the cart drawer

settings.label: Icon Image
settings.info: Upload an image to replace the default shipping protection icon. Leave blank to use the default SVG shield.

settings.label: Heading Text
settings.info: Customize the main heading for the shipping protection section.

settings.label: Description Text
settings.default: Protect your order from damage, loss, or theft during shipping
settings.info: Customize the descriptive text below the heading.

settings.label: Show Payment Icons
settings.info: Display payment method icons below the checkout button in the cart drawer

settings.label: Use Custom Payment Icons
settings.info: Replace default payment icons with custom SVGs or images

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 1
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 1

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 2
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 2

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 3
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 3

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 4
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 4

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 5
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 5

settings.label: Custom SVG Icon 6
settings.info: Paste custom SVG code for payment method 6

settings.label: Payment Icons Override Image
settings.info: Upload a single image containing all your payment icons (will replace all SVG icons when uploaded)

settings.label: Override Image - Top Padding
settings.info: Add space above the payment override image

settings.label: Override Image - Bottom Padding
settings.info: Add space below the payment override image

settings.label: Override Image - Left Padding
settings.info: Add space to the left of the payment override image

settings.label: Override Image - Right Padding
settings.info: Add space to the right of the payment override image

settings.label: Override Image - Top Margin
settings.info: Add external space above the payment override image

settings.label: Override Image - Bottom Margin
settings.info: Add external space below the payment override image

settings.label: Show Money Back Guarantee
settings.info: Display the money back guarantee banner in the cart drawer

settings.label: Money Back Guarantee Text
settings.info: Complete text for the money back guarantee message

settings.label: Guarantee Icon
settings.info: Icon to display next to the money back guarantee text

settings.label: Text & Icon Color
settings.info: Color for the guarantee text and icon. Leave blank to use current text color.

settings.label: Show Discount Banner
settings.info: Display a customizable discount banner in the cart drawer

settings.label: Banner Text (First Part)
settings.info: First part of text, displayed in bold

settings.label: Banner Text (Middle Part)
settings.info: Middle part of text, displayed in regular weight

settings.label: Banner Text (Last Part)
settings.info: Last part of text, displayed in regular weight

settings.label: Background Color
settings.info: Used when "Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer" is disabled. Otherwise uses Accent Color 2.

settings.label: Text Color
settings.info: Used when "Use Theme Colors for Cart Drawer" is disabled. Otherwise uses Accent Color 1.

settings.label: Use Gradient Background
settings.info: Enable gradient background for the discount banner (overrides background color)

settings.label: Gradient Start Color
settings.info: Starting color for the gradient background

settings.label: Gradient End Color
settings.info: Ending color for the gradient background

settings.label: Gradient Angle
settings.info: Direction of the gradient (0 = left to right, 90 = top to bottom)

settings.label: Amount limit for free shipping
settings.info: Enter product price. Ex. 40. Leave this field empty to disable. NOTE: You must set up an automatic discount in your Shopify admin for orders over this amount to actually provide free shipping.

settings.label: Amount limit for free product
settings.info: Enter product price. Ex. 40. Leave this field empty to disable. NOTE: For this to work, you need to add the product and set it as free in your product settings.

settings.label: Continue Shopping Text Color
settings.info: Text color for the continue shopping button when theme colors are disabled

settings.label: Show search in header
settings.info: Enable or disable the search bar in the header

settings.label: t:settings_schema.search_input.settings.predictive_search_show_vendor.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.search_input.settings.predictive_search_show_vendor.info

settings.label: t:settings_schema.search_input.settings.predictive_search_show_price.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.search_input.settings.predictive_search_show_price.info

settings.label: Free Shipping Notice Date Format
settings.info: Customize the date format using standard codes (e.g., %d/%m/%Y for DD/MM/YYYY, %m-%d-%y for MM-DD-YY). Leave blank for default (Month Day with suffix). [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/api/liquid/filters/date#format-options)

settings.label: Save Text
settings.info: Text displayed for discount/save amounts (e.g., 'SAVE 20%')

settings.label: t:settings_schema.cart.settings.cart_drawer.collection.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.cart.settings.cart_drawer.collection.info
